comments.body: I wonder if it would be worth marking the past items as done, so it's cleared on achieved vs aims
if we do that, we'd have to update this page every time a date passes, which seems like more work than it's worth

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +14,18 @@.. note:: We plan to post weekly alpha releases to the `PyPI ansible project <https://pypi.org/project/ansible/>`_ for testing.

- 2020-06-23: ansible-2.10 alpha freeze.
  No net new collections will be added to the ``ansible-2.10`` package after this date.
- 2020-07-10: Ansible collections freeze date for content shuffling.
